projects.name: This website!
projects.description: This website is an example of my work that I am very proud of! It is the final project from my web development class I took in 2025. You can see all the work from that class by clicking this link!

projects.name: Total Solar Irradiance Detection Using CNNs
projects.description: For my Data Mining class in my third year at American University, my partner Henry Goodwin and I worked to develop a neural network which could predict Total Solar Irradiance values from solar imagery.

projects.name: Pokemon Showdown Reinforcement Learning
projects.description: This is a work in progress for my AI class at AU where I am working on building a reinforcement learning model to learn how best to play pokemon.
